page.title: 03EASTHAM LODGE GOLF CLUB.
page.content: Eastham golf club is one of the many{ {clubs}on Merseyside.It runs east of Carlett park and joins onto Leverhulme sports fields.It was built in 1974 and is now 11 years old.The club house took 9 months to build. There are 5 different memberships in the golf club,they are full golf membership,5 day membership, Intermediate membership,junior membership and social membership. The club has 510 members all together. There are 15 holes on the course but they play 3 of them twice.The length of the course is 5,826 yards.At the course they have a residant professional his name is Ivor Jones.At the course hole number 8 is considered to be the most difficult hole on the the course.The par for the course is 70.The lowest score at the course is 64.This score was achieved by Ian
